text.ascii: sUta uvAca
text.ur: sūta uvāca

text.ascii: evam uktvA tataH zrImAn mantribhiz cAnumoditaH
text.ur: evam uktvā tataḥ śrīmān mantribhiś cānumoditaḥ

text.ascii: Aruroha pratijJAM sa sarpasatrAya pArthivaH
text.ur: āruroha pratijñāṁ sa sarpasatrāya pārthivaḥ

text.ascii: brahman bharatazArdUlo rAjA pArikSitas tadA
text.ur: brahman bharataśārdūlo rājā pārikṣitas tadā

text.ascii: purohitam athAhUya RtvijaM vasudhAdhipaH
text.ur: purohitam athāhūya r̥tvijaṁ vasudhādhipaḥ

text.ascii: abravId vAkyasaMpannaH saMpadarthakaraM vacaH
text.ur: abravīd vākyasaṁpannaḥ saṁpadarthakaraṁ vacaḥ

text.ascii: yo me hiMsitavAMs tAtaM takSakaH sa durAtmavAn
text.ud: यो मे हिंसितवांस्तातं तक्षकः स दुरात्मवान्
text.ur: yo me hiṁsitavāṁs tātaṁ takṣakaḥ sa durātmavān

text.ascii: pratikuryAM yathA tasya tad bhavanto bruvantu me
text.ud: प्रतिकुर्यां यथा तस्य तद्भवन्तो ब्रुवन्तु मे
text.ur: pratikuryāṁ yathā tasya tad bhavanto bruvantu me

text.ascii: api tat karma viditaM bhavatAM yena pannagam
text.ud: अपि तत्कर्म विदितं भवतां येन पन्नगम्
text.ur: api tat karma viditaṁ bhavatāṁ yena pannagam

text.ascii: takSakaM saMpradIpte 'gnau prApsye 'haM sahabAndhavam
text.ur: takṣakaṁ saṁpradīpte ’gnau prāpsye ’haṁ sahabāndhavam

text.ascii: yathA tena pitA mahyaM pUrvaM dagdho viSAgninA
text.ud: यथा तेन पिता मह्यं पूर्वं दग्धो विषाग्निना
text.ur: yathā tena pitā mahyaṁ pūrvaṁ dagdho viṣāgninā

text.ascii: tathAham api taM pApaM dagdhum icchAmi pannagam
text.ur: tathāham api taṁ pāpaṁ dagdhum icchāmi pannagam

text.ascii: Rtvija UcuH
text.ur: r̥tvija ūcuḥ

text.ascii: asti rAjan mahat satraM tvadarthaM devanirmitam
text.ur: asti rājan mahat satraṁ tvadarthaṁ devanirmitam

text.ascii: sarpasatram iti khyAtaM purANe kathyate nRpa
text.ur: sarpasatram iti khyātaṁ purāṇe kathyate nr̥pa

text.ascii: AhartA tasya satrasya tvan nAnyo 'sti narAdhipa
text.ur: āhartā tasya satrasya tvan nānyo ’sti narādhipa

text.ascii: iti paurANikAH prAhur asmAkaM cAsti sa kratuH
text.ud: इति पौराणिकाः प्राहुरस्माकं चास्ति स क्रतुः
text.ur: iti paurāṇikāḥ prāhur asmākaṁ cāsti sa kratuḥ

text.ascii: sUta uvAca
text.ur: sūta uvāca

text.ascii: evam uktaH sa rAjarSir mene sarpaM hi takSakam
text.ud: एवमुक्तः स राजर्षिर्मेने सर्पं हि तक्षकम्
text.ur: evam uktaḥ sa rājarṣir mene sarpaṁ hi takṣakam

text.ascii: hutAzanamukhaM dIptaM praviSTam iti sattama
text.ur: hutāśanamukhaṁ dīptaṁ praviṣṭam iti sattama

text.ascii: tato 'bravIn mantravidas tAn rAjA brAhmaNAMs tadA
text.ur: tato ’bravīn mantravidas tān rājā brāhmaṇāṁs tadā

text.ascii: AhariSyAmi tat satraM saMbhArAH saMbhriyantu me
text.ur: āhariṣyāmi tat satraṁ saṁbhārāḥ saṁbhriyantu me

text.ascii: tatas te Rtvijas tasya zAstrato dvijasattama
text.ur: tatas te r̥tvijas tasya śāstrato dvijasattama

text.ascii: dezaM taM mApayAm Asur yajJAyatanakAraNAt
text.ur: deśaṁ taṁ māpayām āsur yajñāyatanakāraṇāt

text.ascii: yathAvaj jJAnaviduSaH sarve buddhyA paraM gatAH
text.ur: yathāvaj jñānaviduṣaḥ sarve buddhyā paraṁ gatāḥ

text.ascii: RddhyA paramayA yuktam iSTaM dvijagaNAyutam
text.ur: r̥ddhyā paramayā yuktam iṣṭaṁ dvijagaṇāyutam

text.ascii: prabhUtadhanadhAnyADhyam RtvigbhiH sunivezitam
text.ur: prabhūtadhanadhānyāḍhyam r̥tvigbhiḥ suniveśitam

text.ascii: nirmAya cApi vidhivad yajJAyatanam Ipsitam
text.ur: nirmāya cāpi vidhivad yajñāyatanam īpsitam

text.ascii: rAjAnaM dIkSayAm AsuH sarpasatrAptaye tadA
text.ur: rājānaṁ dīkṣayām āsuḥ sarpasatrāptaye tadā

text.ascii: idaM cAsIt tatra pUrvaM sarpasatre bhaviSyati
text.ur: idaṁ cāsīt tatra pūrvaṁ sarpasatre bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: nimittaM mahad utpannaM yajJavighnakaraM tadA
text.ur: nimittaṁ mahad utpannaṁ yajñavighnakaraṁ tadā

text.ascii: yajJasyAyatane tasmin kriyamANe vaco 'bravIt
text.ur: yajñasyāyatane tasmin kriyamāṇe vaco ’bravīt

text.ascii: sthapatir buddhisaMpanno vAstuvidyAvizAradaH
text.ur: sthapatir buddhisaṁpanno vāstuvidyāviśāradaḥ

text.ascii: ity abravIt sUtradhAraH sUtaH paurANikas tadA
text.ur: ity abravīt sūtradhāraḥ sūtaḥ paurāṇikas tadā

text.ascii: yasmin deze ca kAle ca mApaneyaM pravartitA
text.ud: यस्मिन्देशे च काले च मापनेयं प्रवर्तिता
text.ur: yasmin deśe ca kāle ca māpaneyaṁ pravartitā

text.ascii: brAhmaNaM kAraNaM kRtvA nAyaM saMsthAsyate kratuH
text.ud: ब्राह्मणं कारणं कृत्वा नायं संस्थास्यते क्रतुः
text.ur: brāhmaṇaṁ kāraṇaṁ kr̥tvā nāyaṁ saṁsthāsyate kratuḥ

text.ascii: etac chrutvA tu rAjA sa prAgdIkSAkAlam abravIt
text.ur: etac chrutvā tu rājā sa prāgdīkṣākālam abravīt

text.ascii: kSattAraM neha me kaz cid ajJAtaH pravized iti
text.ur: kṣattāraṁ neha me kaś cid ajñātaḥ praviśed iti

text.ascii: tataH karma pravavRte sarpasatre vidhAnataH
text.ur: tataḥ karma pravavr̥te sarpasatre vidhānataḥ

text.ascii: paryakrAmaMz ca vidhivat sve sve karmaNi yAjakAH
text.ur: paryakrāmaṁś ca vidhivat sve sve karmaṇi yājakāḥ

text.ascii: paridhAya kRSNavAsAMsi dhUmasaMraktalocanAH
text.ur: paridhāya kr̥ṣṇavāsāṁsi dhūmasaṁraktalocanāḥ

text.ascii: juhuvur mantravac caiva samiddhaM jAtavedasam
text.ur: juhuvur mantravac caiva samiddhaṁ jātavedasam

text.ascii: kampayantaz ca sarveSAm uragANAM manAMsi te
text.ur: kampayantaś ca sarveṣām uragāṇāṁ manāṁsi te

text.ascii: sarpAn Ajuhuvus tatra sarvAn agnimukhe tadA
text.ur: sarpān ājuhuvus tatra sarvān agnimukhe tadā

text.ascii: tataH sarpAH samApetuH pradIpte havyavAhane
text.ur: tataḥ sarpāḥ samāpetuḥ pradīpte havyavāhane

text.ascii: viveSTamAnAH kRpaNA AhvayantaH parasparam
text.ur: viveṣṭamānāḥ kr̥paṇā āhvayantaḥ parasparam

text.ascii: visphurantaH zvasantaz ca veSTayantas tathA pare
text.ur: visphurantaḥ śvasantaś ca veṣṭayantas tathā pare

text.ascii: pucchaiH zirobhiz ca bhRzaM citrabhAnuM prapedire
text.ur: pucchaiḥ śirobhiś ca bhr̥śaṁ citrabhānuṁ prapedire

text.ascii: zvetAH kRSNAz ca nIlAz ca sthavirAH zizavas tathA
text.ur: śvetāḥ kr̥ṣṇāś ca nīlāś ca sthavirāḥ śiśavas tathā

text.ascii: ruvanto bhairavAn nAdAn petur dIpte vibhAvasau
text.ur: ruvanto bhairavān nādān petur dīpte vibhāvasau

text.ascii: evaM zatasahasrANi prayutAny arbudAni ca
text.ur: evaṁ śatasahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca

text.ascii: avazAni vinaSTAni pannagAnAM dvijottama
text.ur: avaśāni vinaṣṭāni pannagānāṁ dvijottama

text.ascii: indurA iva tatrAnye hastihastA ivApare
text.ur: indurā iva tatrānye hastihastā ivāpare

text.ascii: mattA iva ca mAtaGgA mahAkAyA mahAbalAH
text.ud: मत्ता इव च मातङ्गा महाकाया महाबलाः
text.ur: mattā iva ca mātaṅgā mahākāyā mahābalāḥ

text.ascii: uccAvacAz ca bahavo nAnAvarNA viSolbaNAH
text.ur: uccāvacāś ca bahavo nānāvarṇā viṣolbaṇāḥ

text.ascii: ghorAz ca parighaprakhyA dandazUkA mahAbalAH
text.ur: ghorāś ca parighaprakhyā dandaśūkā mahābalāḥ

text.ascii: prapetur agnAv uragA mAtRvAgdaNDapIDitAH
text.ur: prapetur agnāv uragā mātr̥vāgdaṇḍapīḍitāḥ
